name: Generic Dungeon
description:
Game made for the "Game Off 2022" Hosted by GitHub in November 2022.

It had been a long time since the last time that anyone had seen or heard from evil Azzuro the outcast. Rumors circulated throughout the city of what had become of him, with most concluding that he had either abandoned his wicked ways or met a gruesome end.

One day, while scouring through abandoned buildings in search of illicit goods and creatures, four adventurers stumbled upon a ruined building occupied only by ruins and cobwebs. As they entered, they felt an icy Presence emanating from within and soon found themselves paralyzed by terror. It was none other than evil Azzuro himself!

"You've drawn me to your world as I've drawn you to mine," he said sinisterly. "Now you will suffer for your trespassing!"

The controls are customisable in the Settings menu on the Main screen, but in case here are the defaults.

Movements :
  • Z to go UP
  • Q to go LEFT
  • S to go DOWN
  • D to go RIGHT
Attacks :
  • Left Click to swing the item you are holding
  • Right Click to do a barrel roll
  • A for the Potion
Assets Credit :
  • Voices : https://dillonbecker.itch.io/sdap
  • Music : https://bit-by-bit-sound.itch.io/8-bit-music-booster-pack
  • Fonts : https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-free
  • Sprites : https://kenney-assets.itch.io/tiny-dungeon
